thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com | 2 of 111
thread.title: Dena Shapiro
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Dena Shapiro

author: Dena Shapiro
title: Dena Shapiro
text: My dishwasher was leaking and was no longer salvagable. Choice opened my claim immediately, had the appliance company contact me and in 2 days I had the technician out to observe the dishwasher. Choice contacted me the next day and paid me for a new dishwasher. Issue resolved. Thank you Choice.
